answers.answer: Hi.  I'm not a medical professional, just the parent of a kid with diabetes.  Yes, that is a valid response.  The 504 process starts with you requesting one, and then an evaluation team is formed to determine whether a 504 is appropriate.  Diabetes is substantially limiting, but just having diabetes doesn't automatically mean you get one.  Stick to your message, though, and you will convince them.  Good luck.
